name: Processes
description: Learn how to create and manage business processes

steps.title: Process Management
steps.content: Processes help you define and visualize workflows in your organization.

steps.title: Create a Process
steps.content: Click 'New Process' to create a new workflow.

steps.title: Visual Editor
steps.content: Use the drag-and-drop editor to design your process flow.

steps.title: Adding Activities
steps.content: Drag activities from the toolbar to add steps to your process.

steps.title: Connecting Steps
steps.content: Connect activities by dragging from one node's handle to another.
